references: Related: CF 201557, CF 201165, CF 201517. Amending: Ord 45382
summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the south 555.29 feet of the north 655.29 feet of the southwest quarter of the southwest quarter of Section 10-25-4 lying east of the Northern Pacific Railroad right-of-way; Lots 32 and 33 except the west fifteen feet thereof, Block "C", Brooklyn Supplemental Addition; and a portion of Lots 5 and 30, Block 26, Hill Tract Addition Supplement; with respect to Use and Area Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto two new sections numbered 2-240 and 17-186, respectively.
